_header: In holy book find we / That this day has names three
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Purification, feast of
_description: Gospel for the Feast of the Purification, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
In holy Bok fynde weÞat þis day hath Nomes
                    þre…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now vndurstonde ȝe I weneWhat þe feste of þis
                    day wol mene

BodAsh42.First Lines:
IN hali boke writen find weþat þis daie hafe names
                    thre…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Now vndirstand maie ȝe i weneWhat ye feste of to daie
                    will mene

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
IN holi boke þen fynde weÞat þis day has names
                    thre…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:

                    day specialy
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:

                    80)

                    day wile mene
